item.field: Shammi Kapoor, Vyjayantimala, Rajendra Nath, Ajit, Helen, Leela Chitnis, Parveen Choudhary, Sudhir, Sunder, Rashid Khan
To better himself, a spoiled prince temporarily assumes a commoner’s identity. But he soon learns his palace has been gifted to his father’s new wife.
John Wayne, Glen Campbell, Kim Darby, Jeremy Slate, Robert Duvall, Dennis Hopper, Alfred Ryder, Strother Martin, Jeff Corey
Teenage tomboy Mattie Ross enlists the help of crusty lawman Rooster Cogburn to track down the hired hand who murdered her father.
